review: I love this thing!  I can watch what I want, whenever I want!!  I'm going to cut off my cable and save the money to get Hulu Plus and some other "on demand" programs.  It will be far less paying for Netflix (love it), Hulu Plus and whatever else I can find than it is to pay for cable when NOTHING is on the 100 channels they "give" you.  I love Amazon! and I love my Amazon Fire Stick!
author: hgetch

review: Well worth the $40.00! Since I already have Amazon Prime, we have been able to watch so many movies. My grandchildren now pick out a new movie every Friday night. Love it!
author: Plaidlady

review: Love this thing. Set up was super easy and it's great to have on a "dumb" TV.
author: Cynic

review: Does YouTube but runs up against buffering alot
author: Michelle Maroot

review: This Fire stick is on point...love it!!!
author: derick fountain

review: I really like the Fire TV Stick. It was easy to set up and gives you a lot of viewing choices.
author: D. Compton

review: I am very happy with my fire stick. Plugged it in and away u go. Did not have any problems that others on these posts were having with signal. It has u on already if u are a prime member. Great product.
author: Heather M. Wilcoxon "Jake"
